mapper.update:
update hos_out_balance_detail
pid = #{pid}, bill_id = #{billId}, row_num = #{rowNum}, prov_id = #{provId}, prov_name = #{provName}, prov_erp_code = #{provErpCode}, out_dept_id = #{outDeptId}, out_dept_name = #{outDeptName}, out_dept_erp_code = #{outDeptErpCode}, out_billid = #{outBillid}, out_row_num = #{outRowNum}, out_date = #{outDate}, hos_goods_id = #{hosGoodsId}, hos_goods_name = #{hosGoodsName}, goods_gg = #{goodsGg}, mfrs_id = #{mfrsId}, made = #{made}, packet_code = #{packetCode}, prov_goods_id = #{provGoodsId}, prov_goods_name = #{provGoodsName}, batch_id = #{batchId}, batch_code = #{batchCode}, sterilization_code = #{sterilizationCode}, expdt_end_date = #{expdtEndDate}, produce_datetime = #{produceDatetime}, hos_unit = #{hosUnit}, hos_unit_qty = #{hosUnitQty}, prov_unit = #{provUnit}, hos_scale = #{hosScale}, prov_unit_qty = #{provUnitQty}, out_kind = #{outKind}, status = #{status}, invoice_number = #{invoiceNumber}, invoice_code = #{invoiceCode},
sale_man = #{saleMan}, sterilization_date = #{sterilizationDate}, sterilization_end_date = #{sterilizationEndDate}, version=version+1,
last_update_datetime = sysdate(),
last_update_datetime = sysdate,
and id = #{id} and version= #{version}

update.foreach:
update hos_out_balance_detail
pid = #{item.pid}, bill_id = #{item.billId}, row_num = #{item.rowNum}, prov_id = #{item.provId}, prov_name = #{item.provName}, prov_erp_code = #{item.provErpCode}, out_dept_id = #{item.outDeptId}, out_dept_name = #{item.outDeptName}, out_dept_erp_code = #{item.outDeptErpCode}, out_billid = #{item.outBillid}, out_row_num = #{item.outRowNum}, out_date = #{item.outDate}, hos_goods_id = #{item.hosGoodsId}, hos_goods_name = #{item.hosGoodsName}, goods_gg = #{item.goodsGg}, mfrs_id = #{item.mfrsId}, made = #{item.made}, packet_code = #{item.packetCode}, prov_goods_id = #{item.provGoodsId}, prov_goods_name = #{item.provGoodsName}, batch_id = #{item.batchId}, batch_code = #{item.batchCode}, sterilization_code = #{item.sterilizationCode}, expdt_end_date = #{item.expdtEndDate}, produce_datetime = #{item.produceDatetime}, hos_unit = #{item.hosUnit}, hos_unit_qty = #{item.hosUnitQty}, prov_unit = #{item.provUnit}, hos_scale = #{item.hosScale}, prov_unit_qty = #{item.provUnitQty}, status = #{item.status}, out_kind = #{item.outKind}, sale_man = #{item.saleMan}, sterilization_date = #{item.sterilizationDate}, sterilization_end_date = #{item.sterilizationEndDate}, version=version+1,
last_update_datetime = sysdate(),
last_update_datetime = sysdate,
and id = #{item.id} and version= #{item.version}

mapper.insert: insert into hos_out_balance_detail ( id , pid , bill_id , row_num , prov_id , prov_name , prov_erp_code , out_dept_id , out_dept_name , out_dept_erp_code , out_billid , out_row_num , out_date , hos_goods_id , hos_goods_name , goods_gg , mfrs_id , made , packet_code , prov_goods_id , prov_goods_name , batch_id , batch_code , sterilization_code , expdt_end_date , produce_datetime , hos_unit , hos_unit_qty , prov_unit , hos_scale , prov_unit_qty,status , out_kind , version, invoice_number,invoice_code,sale_man,sterilization_date,sterilization_end_date,last_update_datetime ) values (#{id},#{pid},#{billId},#{rowNum},#{provId},#{provName},#{provErpCode},#{outDeptId},#{outDeptName},#{outDeptErpCode},#{outBillid}, #{outRowNum},#{outDate},#{hosGoodsId},#{hosGoodsName},#{goodsGg},#{mfrsId},#{made},#{packetCode},#{provGoodsId},#{provGoodsName}, #{batchId},#{batchCode},#{sterilizationCode},#{expdtEndDate},#{produceDatetime},#{hosUnit},#{hosUnitQty},#{provUnit},#{hosScale}, #{provUnitQty},#{status},#{outKind},#{version},#{invoiceNumber},#{invoiceCode},#{saleMan},#{sterilizationDate}, #{sterilizationEndDate},sysdate())

insert into hos_out_balance_detail ( id , pid , bill_id , row_num , prov_id , prov_name , prov_erp_code , out_dept_id , out_dept_name , out_dept_erp_code , out_billid , out_row_num , out_date , hos_goods_id , hos_goods_name , goods_gg , mfrs_id , made , packet_code , prov_goods_id , prov_goods_name , batch_id , batch_code , sterilization_code , expdt_end_date , produce_datetime , hos_unit , hos_unit_qty , prov_unit , hos_scale , prov_unit_qty ,status, out_kind , version, invoice_number,invoice_code,sale_man,sterilization_date,sterilization_end_date,last_update_datetime ) values
(#{item.id},#{item.pid},#{item.billId},#{item.rowNum},#{item.provId},#{item.provName},#{item.provErpCode},#{item.outDeptId}, #{item.outDeptName},#{item.outDeptErpCode},#{item.outBillid},#{item.outRowNum},#{item.outDate},#{item.hosGoodsId}, #{item.hosGoodsName},#{item.goodsGg},#{item.mfrsId},#{item.made},#{item.packetCode},#{item.provGoodsId},#{item.provGoodsName}, #{item.batchId},#{item.batchCode},#{item.sterilizationCode},#{item.expdtEndDate},#{item.produceDatetime},#{item.hosUnit}, #{item.hosUnitQty},#{item.provUnit},#{item.hosScale},#{item.provUnitQty},#{item.status},#{item.outKind},#{item.version}, #{item.invoiceNumber},#{item.invoiceCode},#{item.saleMan},#{item.sterilizationDate},#{item.sterilizationEndDate},sysdate())
